item.title: Under Trump, AI Scientists Are Told to Remove ‘Ideological Bias’ From Powerful Models
item.description: A directive from the National Institute of Standards and Technology eliminates mention of “AI safety” and “AI fairness.”

item.title: Meta Tries to Bury a Tell-All Book
item.description: Mark Zuckerberg might be in his post-fact-checking-era. But that hasn’t stopped Meta from going after the author of Careless People.
